Pre-Game Insights: Steven Smith is likely to return after missing the Afghanistan game, whereas Bangladesh will be without Shakib Al Hasan
Australia will field their strongest available line-up for the clash in Pune
Bangladesh are in a fight to be among the top eight teams to qualify for the Champions Trophy
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Maharashtra Cricket Association surface has been batting-friendly with South Africa and England posting scores over 330 after batting first in the last two matches at the ground
Bangladesh vs Australia have not played against each other in ODIs since the 2019 World Cup
Glenn Maxwell is 108 runs away from becoming the 19th Australian to reach 4000 ODI runs
